name: Chronoshift
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You revert yourself back to your status after your last rest, including hit points, MP, condition, and remaining uses of talents or features. You then lose the MP spent on this spell.

Casting this spell again before completing a rest instead causes you to get lost in time for 2d4+2 hours, removing you from the current timeline and causing you to vanish. When the duration expires, you reappear in the same location you cast this spell.
